definitions.definition: Ellipsis of mainline ( “ to inject (a drug) directly into a vein ” ) .
To mainly play a specific character or side , or with specific equipment , during a game .
examples: He mains the same character as me in that game.
What race do you main and what is your favourite race to beat?
For new players, I recommend maining the dagger and using the axe as a backup weapon.

definitions.definition: To convert (a road) into a main or primary road.

main_definition: ( transitive , slang ) Ellipsis of mainline ( “ to inject (a drug) directly into a vein ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , gaming ) To mainly play a specific character or side , or with specific equipment , during a game .
( obsolete ) To convert (a road) into a main or primary road.
